name: Bonk's Curse
description:
Bonk's Curse is a 2D Top-down Puzzle Game, in which you play as Bonk, a child who's been cursed by an evil sorceress.

Because of the curse, you can only move in straight lines ! You will have to think carefully about your movements if you want to reach the exit door.

Find and defeat the sorceress to lift the curse !

Controls :

Move with the arrow keys, or the WASD/ZQSD keys.

You can also use the mouse in the menus.

This game was made as a school projet by a team of 2 students :

Game Design & Programmation : Léana Terakopiantz

Game Art & Sound Design : Tristan Duribreux

Apart from the music, everything was created by ourselves.
